ComicInfo.Summary: The battle of Armageddon rages! Avengelyne battles her son, the demon half-breed Magog, as the heavens shake and the earth trembles in the wake of the final and most vicious battle of all! The villainous Micah rallies his forces in preparation for mankind's ultimate destruction.
ComicInfo.Writer: Rob Liefeld,Robert Place Napton,Robert Napton,Rob Liefeld,Robert Napton
